name: Claustrophobic (bigassopper, Júlia Rosa)
description:
This is our submission to the IVGD Treehouse game jam 2020. Theme was "Tiny Space".

This  game is about a guy who struggles with claustrophobia.

If you don't know what claustrophobia is, let me give you a quick explanation: Claustrophobia is a situational phobia triggered by an irrational and intense fear of tight or crowded spaces. It can be triggered by things like being locked in a windowless room, being stuck in a crowded elevator, or just being in a tiny and closed space.

So, knowing that, you are going to experience playing inside of a claustrophobic's head.
On each room there will be puzzles to solve within 40 seconds while the screen gets smaller and smaller.

Good luck and thank your for playing!
